Draw the first arc from (0.075,0) to (0.675,0) with center at (0.3525,0.0325) and radius of 0.22. 4. Draw the second line from (0.675,0) to (0.75,0.075). 5. Draw the second arc from (0.75,0.075) to (0.75,0.3) with center at (0.7125,0.1825) and radius of 0.22. 6. Draw the third line from (0.75,0.3) to (0.075,0.3). 7. Draw the third arc from (0.075,0.3) to (0,0.075) with center at (0.3525,0.2675) and radius of 0.22. 8. Close the loop. **Extruding the sketch:** 1. Extrude the sketch by 0.15 units along the positive Z direction. 2. Scale the extrusion by 0.75 in all directions. **Part 2: A tapered cylindrical object** Create a new coordinate system with the following settings: 1. Euler Angles: [0.0, 0.0, 0.0] 2. Translation Vector: [0.225, 0.0375, 0.15] **Sketching the base:** 1. Create a new sketch on the X-Y plane of the new coordinate system. 2. Draw a circle centered at (0.15,0.15) with radius 0.15. **Extruding the sketch:** 1. Extrude the sketch by 0.375 units along the positive Z direction. 2. Scale the extrusion by 0.3 in all directions. 3. Join the new body to the existing CAD model. **Final Shape: A cylindrical object with a rectangular hole in the center, slightly tapered towards the bottom, and elongated and narrows towards the top.** 1. The overall length of the shape is approximately 0.75 units. 2. The overall width of the shape is approximately 0.3 units. 3. The overall height of the shape is approximately 0.6 units. 4. The base is a rectangular prism with a curved side, as described in Part 1. 5. The top is a cylindrical object with a tapered top and bottom, as described in Part 2. 6. The center of the base has a rectangular hole that goes through the entire height of the part and intersects with the bottom of the cylindrical object on top. 7. The outline of the hole is defined by the base sketch of Part 1. 8. The shape is slightly tapered towards the bottom, due to the tapering of the cylindrical object on top. 9. The overall shape narrows towards the top, created by the elongated and narrowed top of the cylindrical object.</description>
